parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post includes a CMF number (CMF: 11240014) at the end, which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post explicitly refers to Dan Cosma, a candidate for the AUR party in the senatorial elections for Bistrița-Năsăud County.  The phrase "POZIȚIA 1 PE BULETINUL DE VOT!" (Position 1 on the ballot) directly encourages voters to vote for him.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The content is not a private message but a public statement targeting a large number of people.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The post's primary objective is to influence voters to support Dan Cosma. It highlights his candidacy, his position on the ballot, and uses emotionally charged language ("revoltă," "luptă") to rally support. The mention of specific political events and opponents further reinforces this objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: While the post presents some information about political events, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting.  It is clearly biased in favor of Dan Cosma and the AUR party, using strong opinions and accusations against opponents.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The post goes beyond expressing a personal opinion. It actively promotes a candidate and encourages voters to support him, which is a clear violation of electoral regulations.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>593615980022376</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a candidate (Dan Cosma), uses emotionally charged language to influence voters, and aims to increase votes for him. The presence of the CMF number further confirms its nature as electoral propaganda. The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is a clear violation of Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Dan Cosma</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>AUR</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Entitatea responsabilă de postare], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări (ID: 593615980022376) cu conținut electoral care promovează candidatura lui Dan Cosma pentru AUR, folosind un limbaj emoțional și apeluri directe la vot ("POZIȚIA 1 PE BULETINUL DE VOT!"), având ca efect electoral influențarea pozitivă a voturilor pentru acesta. Postarea conține, de asemenea, un număr CMF (CMF: 11240014), indicând clar natura sa de material de propagandă electorală.  Această acțiune constituie propagandă electorală după încheierea perioadei legale, fiind astfel o încălcare clară a legislației.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
